attributes.action: Change the criteria for becoming an MP to include the following
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The criteria for becoming an MP should be amended to include that applicants for a parliamentary seat should have served a minimum of 1 year in Her Majesty's Forces. Those who have not should not gain entry to Parliament as a member.  This will hopefully help members of parliament decide on whether sending some mothers son to war on possibly suspect information or intelligence isnt such a good idea at all.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
